name: enact-cli
description: Official CLI for the Enact Protocol - package, secure, and discover AI tools

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && bun build ./src/mcp-entry.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && bun build ./src/mcp-server.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && bun build ./src/mcp-direct.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && sed -i.bak '1{/^#!/d;}' ./dist/index.js && sed -i.bak '1{/^#!/d;}' ./dist/mcp-entry.js && sed -i.bak '1{/^#!/d;}' ./dist/mcp-server.js && sed -i.bak '1{/^#!/d;}' ./dist/mcp-direct.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/index.js > temp && mv temp ./dist/index.js && chmod +x ./dist/index.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/mcp-entry.js > temp2 && mv temp2 ./dist/mcp-entry.js && chmod +x ./dist/mcp-entry.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/mcp-server.js > temp3 && mv temp3 ./dist/mcp-server.js && chmod +x ./dist/mcp-server.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/mcp-direct.js > temp4 && mv temp4 ./dist/mcp-direct.js && chmod +x ./dist/mcp-direct.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos && npm run build:windows
scripts.release: npm run build:all && npm run build

author: EnactProtocol
